title: Elmer’s Metallic Slime Activator | Magical Liquid Glue Slime Activator, 8.75 FL. oz. Bottle - Great for Making Metallic Slime
description: Want to make glow-in-the-dark slime without the guesswork and mess? Just mix Elmer's Glow in the dark magical liquid with Elmer's glue to make multiple batches of luminous glow-in-the-dark slime every time! It’s the easy way to make glue slime at home with less mess and your ticket to family-friendly fun. Once your slime is created, charge it under some lights, then watch it glow when the lights go off. Featuring an all-in-one formula that’s washable, safe, and nontoxic, This solution transforms most Elmer’s glue into slime without the need of contact solution and baking soda. Experiment and add it to different Elmer’s Glues and explore a wide world of slime creations!
